contributeDesc: Your expertise can help researchers, students, and professionals find the right words. Contribute a new technical term to Domra today
addDesc: Submit new technical terms with accurate Khmer translations
improveDesc: Suggest better translations for existing terms
step1_desc: Navigate to home page and search your preferred word.
step2_desc: Click on the word to view details and click on request.
step3_desc: Input all the required informations and click submit to improve your translation and wait for review.
